Articles.Content:
There are a lot of 'stock craft' in the SPH and VAB. How do I get rid of them?

Edited April 30, 2016 by Docsprock
You can permanently remove them by deleting them from the Ships folder. You can also turn them off per save in the difficulty settings.

20 minutes ago, Red Iron Crown said:

You can permanently remove them by deleting them from the Ships folder.

Im guessing this is a folder within the game somewhere?

23 minutes ago, Red Iron Crown said:

You can also turn them off per save in the difficulty settings.

There is no option for this in sandbox mode. I dont think.

I thought it was possible to delete craft with the 'delete' button in SPH/VAB, but not anymore?

But Thank You! I will hunt down the Ships folder and delete from there.

Yeah, the Ships folder is on the first level of the game folder on your HD. It contains sub-folders for the SPH and the VAB. Just delete their contents (preferably after copying somewhere else so you can revert if you want).

You can't delete them from within the SPH/VAB because they aren't part of your own save (your own ships are in a separate folder within your save folder).
